item.title: Install Tor Snowflake on the Raspberry PI with DietPi.
item.description: Requirements I use a Raspberry Pi 3b with DietPi 8.2.2, which means we need to use 64Bit Packages. I assume that you do everything in your default home folder of the root user. (That is just essential for the last step, but you will notice what you need to change if you use another folder.) Install GO Automatic Open the diet pi software installer by typing: dietpi-software. After that, go to search and search for: go.
